column2: Captain, another wave of attackers has reached our system.
They still won't give it a rest?
Are you ready for another drop?
There are no dropships among them this time. But there is a very large ship of an unknown type.
They must have decided to bring their Big Boss along. Any ideas about what it is?
It would be logical to assume that it's either a really big dropship or their own Death Star. In any case, we better not let it get to Earth.
Roger, we'll try to do that.
